value.expression: Automation: ServiceNow Incident Creation - BOT execution initiated in $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$ on $System:Machine$

Hi Team,
Bot execution is in process in $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$ on $System:Machine$. Do not access $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$ until bot execution process is complete. If any log files are open, kindly close them to avoid bot failure. Thank you!
StartTime: $sBotStartTime$
Automation: ServiceNow Incident Creation - BOT execution error in $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$ on $System:Machine$

ServiceNow Incident Creation: $sTaskName$
Start Time : $sBotStartTime$
End Time : $sBotEndTime$
Environment: $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$
Bot path: $System:AATaskName$
Error Message: $sErrorMessage$
Error Line Number: $nErrorLineNo.Number:toString$
Error snap: $sErrorSnapFile$

$sErrorString$

Task completed. Summary file path: $sCurrentRunArchiveFolder$\Summary_$sTimestamp$.csv.
You can find all of the archived files at path: "$sCurrentRunArchiveFolder$.zip".
Automation: ServiceNow Incident Creation - BOT execution completed in $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$ on $System:Machine$

Hi Team,
ServiceNow Incident creation bot execution completed in $dConfigDict{sEnvironment}$ on $System:Machine$. Please find attachment below for Summary Report.
$sErrorString$
Start Time : $sBotStartTime$
End Time : $sBotEndTime$
No. of Incidents reported in TXT file: $nIncidentsfromTextfiles.Number:toString$
